inclusion.criterion: Good understanding of the French language
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Not suffering from chronic pain, including CRPS

exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient is a 14-year-old boy complaining of scoliosis and back pain. He has no other medical condition.
